quotes.quote: Rock and Roll is inclusive. It welcomes rockers of all races, religions, ages, ethnic backgrounds, alternative lifestyles.
Rock and roll music, if you like it, if you feel it, you can't help but move to it. That's what happens to me. I can't help it.
Rock and roll is a style in which, at least ostensibly, the best artists are rule breakers.
Some people come to our shows and think they're gonna spend the night just listening to love songs, and they're pretty much surprised cause we do a lot of rock and roll.
Rock and Roll is simply an attitude. You don't have to play the greatest guitar.
Most of modern rock and roll is a product of guilt.
Rock and roll ain't nothing but jazz with a hard backbeat.
Energy is so important. If you don't have it, don't bother with rock and roll.
You can't have rock and roll without drugs, you can't have rock and roll without sex.
Rock n Roll might not solve your problems, but it does let you dance all over them.
Rock and roll is the hamburger that ate the world.
Rock and roll is here to stay.
If it's illegal to rock and roll, throw my ass in jail!
For me rock and roll is about the freedom to express yourself very loudly.
Rock and roll doesn't necessarily mean a band. It doesn't mean a singer, and it doesn't mean a lyric, really. It's that question of trying to be immortal.
Rock music should be gross: that's the fun of it. It gets up and drops its trousers.
Rock and Roll has no beginning and no end for it is the very pulse of life itself.
Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no one is allowed to be magnificent.
If I hadn't heard rock and roll on the radio, I would have had no idea there was life on this planet.
Rock and roll keeps you in a constant state of juvenile delinquency.
If you tried to give rock and roll another name, you might call it Chuck Berry.
